languages.text: "Итак, мон-кай..." {n}Маражай смотрит на вас со странным выражением, словно и сам не понимает до конца, что произошло.{/n} "Ты и впрямь намерен{mf||а} сбежать из Прорвы? Дерзкие амбиции для мяса с арены".

traits.locale_text: "Итак, мон-кай..." {n}Маражай смотрит на вас со странным выражением, словно и сам не понимает до конца, что произошло.{/n} "Ты и впрямь намерен{mf||а} сбежать из Прорвы? Дерзкие амбиции для мяса с арены".
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

traits.locale_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

languages.text: « Dites-moi, mon-keigh... » {n}Marazhai vous dévisage en affichant une expression étrange. Il semble avoir du mal à saisir ce qui vient de se passer.{/n} « Vous envisagez vraiment de fuir l'Abîme, n'est-ce pas ? C'est un plan plutôt ambitieux pour un tas de viande. »
languages.original_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, mon-keigh... » {n}Marazhai vous dévisage en affichant une expression étrange. Il semble avoir du mal à saisir ce qui vient de se passer.{/n} « Vous envisagez vraiment de fuir l'Abîme, n'est-ce pas ? C'est un plan plutôt ambitieux pour un tas de viande. »
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: “好了，猴子……”{n}玛拉斋以古怪的表情看着你，似乎在努力理解刚刚发生的事情。{/n}“看得出来，你是真的打算逃出裂隙，是吧？对竞技场的活畜而言，你的野心还真不小。”
languages.original_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

traits.locale_text: “好了，猴子……”{n}玛拉斋以古怪的表情看着你，似乎在努力理解刚刚发生的事情。{/n}“看得出来，你是真的打算逃出裂隙，是吧？对竞技场的活畜而言，你的野心还真不小。”
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: 「それで、モン＝ケイよ…」{n}マラズハイは今起きたことが理解できないような、不思議そうな表情であなたを見ている。{/n}「お前は本当に裂け目から脱出するつもりなんだな？アリーナのエサにしちゃ、大胆な考えを持ってるじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、モン＝ケイよ…」{n}マラズハイは今起きたことが理解できないような、不思議そうな表情であなたを見ている。{/n}「お前は本当に裂け目から脱出するつもりなんだな？アリーナのエサにしちゃ、大胆な考えを持ってるじゃないか」
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "Also, Chem-Pan-Sey ..." {n}Marazhai betrachtet dich mit einem seltsamen Gesichtsausdruck, als ob er nicht begreift, was gerade vorgefallen ist.{/n} "Ihr wollt der Kluft wirklich entfliehen, was? Ehrgeizige Ziele für Arenafleisch."
languages.original_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

traits.locale_text: "Also, Chem-Pan-Sey ..." {n}Marazhai betrachtet dich mit einem seltsamen Gesichtsausdruck, als ob er nicht begreift, was gerade vorgefallen ist.{/n} "Ihr wollt der Kluft wirklich entfliehen, was? Ehrgeizige Ziele für Arenafleisch."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: «Dime, mon-keigh...». {n}Marazhai te mira con una expresión extraña, como si le costase entender lo que acaba de pasar.{/n} «¿De verdad pretendes escapar del Abismo? Un plan ambicioso para ser carne de la arena».
languages.original_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."

traits.locale_text: «Dime, mon-keigh...». {n}Marazhai te mira con una expresión extraña, como si le costase entender lo que acaba de pasar.{/n} «¿De verdad pretendes escapar del Abismo? Un plan ambicioso para ser carne de la arena».
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "Söylesene mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai, olan biteni kavramakta güçlük çekiyormuşçasına tuhaf bir surat ifadesiyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Gerçekten Yarık'tan kaçmayı planlıyorsun, değil mi? Arena eti için cüretkâr bir amaç."
languages.original_text: "So, mon-keigh..." {n}Marazhai looks at you with a strange expression as if struggling to comprehend what has just transpired.{/n} "You really are intent on escaping from the Chasm, aren't you? Bold ambitions for arena meat."
